definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: A concrete plan in the power factory using waste incinerating is developed.
sentences.chinese: 并给出在垃圾焚烧发电厂的具体实施方案。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the solid by-products, rich in energy, could be incinerated as well.
sentences.chinese: 同样，富含能量的固体废弃物可焚烧发电。

sentences.english: So Joshua burned Ai and made it a permanent heap of ruins, a desolate place to this day.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚将艾城焚烧，使城永为高堆，荒场，直到今日。

sentences.english: He shall also burn the fat of the sin offering on the altar.
sentences.chinese: 赎罪祭牲的脂油要在坛上焚烧。

sentences.english: Put the garbage down the incinerator.
sentences.chinese: 把垃圾放入垃圾焚烧炉。

sentences.english: Police stations and offices of the ruling National Democratic Party were on fire across the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国各地的警局和执政党党部被焚烧。

sentences.english: Incineration of pyrolysis with recovery of bromine or hydrobromic acid.
sentences.chinese: 焚烧或裂解以回收溴或氢溴酸。

sentences.english: Incineration is an effective way to solve the problem of municipal solid waste (MSW).
sentences.chinese: 焚烧处理是解决日益增长生活垃圾的有效方法。
有一些在焚化炉内被焚烧。

sentences.english: They set fire to Cao's residence and beat up Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 他们还防火焚烧了曹公馆并殴打了章宗祥。

sentences.english: It will be given into the hands of the king of Babylon, and he will destroy it with fire.
sentences.chinese: 这城必交在巴比伦王的手中，他必用火焚烧。

sentences.english: Burning treatment should be in accordance with the standard for industrial waste disposal.
sentences.chinese: 自己焚烧处理时请按照工业废弃物处理标准焚烧。

sentences.english: Burning treatment should be in accordance with the standard for industrial waste disposal.
sentences.chinese: 自己焚烧处理时请按照工业废弃物处理标准焚烧。

sentences.english: In Hong Kong this week, protesters are burning cardboard cutouts of iPhones.
sentences.chinese: 本周，已有抗议者在香港焚烧纸质iPhone面板。

sentences.english: He shall break also the images of Bethshemesh, that is in the land of Egypt; and the houses of the gods of the Egyptians shall he burn with fire.
sentences.chinese: 他必打碎埃及地伯示麦的柱像，用火焚烧神的庙宇。

sentences.english: Then the sudden smell of burning flesh.
sentences.chinese: 突然传来尸肉焚烧的焦味。

definition: to burn down/to destroy with fire/trad. also written 焚毀
to burn down/to destroy with fire
to set on fire/to commit arson
to put to the torch (idiom)/to commit to the flames/to burn sth down deliberately
